## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G19240](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G19240)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DEM2</u>
- **Gene Name:** DEFECTIVE EMBRYO AND MERISTEMS 2
- **Description:**   Vacuolar import/degradation, Vid27-related protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2094113
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [DEM1/dem1 dem2/dem2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;During male reproductive development, chromosomes fail to align on the metaphase plate at meiosis II and result in abnormal numbers of daughter cells following meiosis. Plants show defects in both pollen and embryo sac development, and produce defective male and female gametes
